title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.25 - Premises-general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.25 - Premises-general

State Regulations
(a) Retail food
stores and all parts of the property used in connection with operations of the
establishment shall be reasonably free of litter and articles not essential to
the operation or maintenance of the establishment. (b) The walking and driving surfaces of all
exterior areas of retail food stores shall be surfaced with concrete, asphalt
or with gravel or similar material effectively treated to facilitate
maintenance and minimize dust. These surfaces shall be graded to facilitate
drainage. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-7.25

Repealed

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
